revised_title: Monte Carlo Simulation of Isopentane Glass Structure and Thermodynamics
tldr: This study presents a Monte Carlo simulation of isopentane glass, examining its structure and thermodynamics. The simulation uses realistic potentials to predict properties of liquid isopentane and its glassy state. The research discusses radial distribution functions, dihedral angle distribution, and the glass transition, providing insights into the structure and behavior of isopentane glass.
